```{r}
#| label: load-packages
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

library(plotly)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(shinyWidgets)
library(shiny)
library(leaflet)

global_energy <- read_csv("owid-energy-data.csv")
countreis <- read_csv("Book1.csv")
```

```{r}
#| echo: false

selectInput(
  inputId = "id2",
  label = "Y-axis variable:",
  choices = colnames(global_energy)
)

multiInput(
   inputId = "Id010",
   label = "Countries:", 
    choices = unique(global_energy$country),
   choiceNames = lapply(seq_along(countries), 
        function(i) tagList(tags$img(src = flags[i],
   width = 20, 
            height = 50), countries[i])),
   choiceValues = countries
)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false

graphing <- function(countries){

graph <- global_energy |>
  filter(country %in% countries) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = year, 
             y = carbon_intensity_of_electricity_production_in_grams_per_kilowatt_hour, 
             color = country)) +
  geom_point(aes(size = real_gross_domestic_product), show.legend = FALSE) +
  geom_smooth(method = "glm", show.legend = FALSE, fullrange = TRUE) 

ggplotly(graph)
}
```


```{r}
#| echo: false

basemap <- leaflet() |>
  addProviderTiles(
    "CartoDB.Positron",
    group = "CartoDB.Positron"
  ) |>
  addTiles() |>
  addMarkers(lng = countreis$longitude, lat = countreis$latitude, popup = graphing(countreis$name))

basemap
```
